I watched this last night.

I found it slow moving rubbish that gave a bout of ADD trying to stay with it, just couldn't get into it at all.

If this goes into general release i may give it another go but TBH i think this is one destined for the dustbin, tries to ride the films and fails, dismally.

Utter detritus IMO and that's for sure.

I mean, Yuch!

Somehow i think this show will never make it to completing a season before it's pulled off air because of failing viewer figures, if it makes it that far.
